plot: Two cannibals/health food diner owners are on a wacky quest to restore life to the five million year old goddess Shitaar. Aided by their uncle's brain and penis, the two set about getting the required parts - virgins, assorted body parts from whores, and the ingredients for a &"blood buffet&". Their adversaries are the police: the chief with a Russian accent, the &"player&" detective, and the new Yorker with an Australian accent.   Written by  Erik Swanson
title: Blood Diner
